description.narrative: National partners have enhanced capacity to extend access to preschool, basic and post-basic education to the most vulnerable children., which contributes to Early Learning, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equitable Access To Quality Education (Covid), Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning Outcomes, Learning Outcomes (Covid), Sanitation, Sanitation (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, education policies and strategies ensure equitable access and completion for the most marginalized in terms of sex, geography and ability.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: National partners have enhanced capacity to extend access to preschool, basic and post-basic education to the most vulnerable children.

description.narrative: UNICEF Morocco continuous support to preschool education scale-up contributed to an enrolment rate increase of 8 percent (from 49 percent to 57 percent) nationally in 2019, while supported 98 inclusive education-based schools and contributed to the development of decentralized plans to implement inclusive education targeted 700 targeted schools nationwide for 2019-21. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:15/01/2020
